location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Coll 5/90/2 ‘BOAC U.K. – Bahrain Service: Landing of Flying Boats at Koweit’

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file. File notes can be found at the back of the file on folio 8. Serial numbers in black and red ink, which occur throughout the file refer to entries in the notes.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 9; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains a small number of papers concerning proposals from the British Overseas Airways Corporation (BOAC) to introduce Koweit [Kuwait] as a calling point on its flying boat service between the United Kingdom (UK) and Bahrain.
